description.basic:
Charge in an unobstructed line to engage a target and perform a melee attack that has a -30% chance to hit, deals +100% damage, and bypasses 10% of the target's Parry chance. Target may Counter-Attack with a -10% chance to hit. Charge distance is based on Movement Range.
Requires a melee weapon. Cannot use while engaged.
description.mastery: Damage increases to +150% and Parry chance bypass to 20%.

description.basic:
Charge in an unbstructed line to engage a target and perform a melee attack that has a +10% chance to hit, deals +40% damage, and bypasses 15% of the target's Dodge and Parry chance. Target may Counter-Attack with a -10% chance to hit. Charge distance is based on Movement Range.
Requires a melee weapon. Cannot use while engaged.
description.mastery: Chance to hit and Dodge and Parry chance bypass increases to 30%. Easy to Master.

description.basic: A melee attack that deals regular damage. If hit, the target gains a debuff that reduces Dodge and Parry chance and Ranged Resistance by 20% for 2 turns. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Dodge and Parry chance and Ranged Resistance debuff increases to 30% for 3 turns.

description.basic: A melee attack that deals +30% damage. Target has a -30% chance to Parry this attack.
description.mastery: Parry chance penalty increases to 60% and damage increases to 60%.

description.basic: Increases melee Damage by 50%, but reduces Melee Resistance by 10% for 2 turns. Each melee attack triggers a free dodge attempt for the target.
description.mastery: Melee Damage increases to 70% and Melee Resistance is reduced by 20% for 3 turns.

description.basic: A melee attack that deals regular damage but with a -40% chance to hit. If hit, the target is stunned unless they pass a Stun Resistance test.
description.mastery: Chance to hit penalty reduced to -20%.

description.basic: Removes up to 1 Open Wound and Poison debuffs each at the cost of 5 Wounds. Range 3 meters.
description.mastery: Removes up to 3 Open Wounds and Poison debuffs each instead. Easy to Master.

description.basic: Effect: Increases the chance to pass Climb, Leap, and Jump Down tests by 15% for 2 turns, but removes 5 wounds at beginning of next turn. This loss can render the target Out of Action. Trivial to Train.
description.mastery: Chance to pass Climb, Leap, and Jump Down tests increases to 30% and duration to 3 turns. Easy to Master.

description.basic: Increases damage and Magic Resistance by 15%. Prevents the use of ranged weapons, stances, spells, and most non-combat actions. Persists until the user is Stunned, Out of Action, or until no enemies are in sight at turn start.
description.mastery: Damage and Magic Resistance increased by 30%.

description.basic: Increases Armour Absorption by 5% for 2 turns, but removes 10 Wounds at the beginning of next turn. This loss can render the target Out of Action. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Increases Armour Absorption by 10% for 3 turns. Not Stackable.

description.basic: Once per turn, restores 1 Offense Point but removes 30 Wounds at the beginning of next turn. This loss can render the target Out of Action.
description.mastery: Restores up to 2 Offense Points instead.

description.basic: Once per turn, restores 1 Strategy Point but removes 30 Wounds at the beginning of next turn. This loss can render the target Out of Action.
description.mastery: Restores up to 2 Strategy Points instead.

description.basic: Allows a Leap attempt costing no Strategy Points, but with a -15% chance. Trivial to Train.
description.mastery: Leap penalty reduced to -5%. Easy to Master.

description.basic: Allows a Jump Down attempt costing no Strategy Points, but with a -45% chance. Trivial to Train.
description.mastery: Jump Down penalty reduced to -5%. Easy to Master.

description.basic: Increases Ranged Resistance by 20% but reduces movement range by by 1 meters for 2 turns.
description.mastery: Ranged Resistance increases to 40% and duration to 3 turns.

description.basic: Allows a Climb attempt costing no Strategy Points, but with a -30% chance.
description.mastery: Climb penalty reduced to -5%. Easy to Master.

description.basic: Take a stance that ends the current turn. Ambush the next enemy that moves into range with a melee attack that deals +50% damage but with a -10% chance to hit. Also allows 1 attempt to Dodge an incoming melee attack with +10% chance.
description.mastery: Ambush Critical Hit and Dodge chance increased to 30%. Cost of using reduced by 1OP. Easy to Master.

description.basic: Take a stance that ends the current turn. The stance allows 2 attempts to Dodge incoming melee attacks.
description.mastery: Dodge attempts increase to 3.

description.basic: Increases the chance to pass All Alone, Fear, and Terror tests by 20% for 2 turns.
description.mastery: Chance to pass increases to 40% for 3 turns.

info.target: Allies within a 5 meter radius around the user

description.basic: Grants immunity to All Alone tests for 1 turn.
description.mastery: Range increases to 30 meters and duration to 3 turns.

description.basic: Target must be engaged with the user. Increases the cost of Flee, Delay, and Disengage actions by 2 Strategy Points for for 2 turns. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Flee, Delay, and Disengage cost increases to 4 Strategy Points, duration to 3 turns.

description.basic: Target must be engaged with the user and have enough Offense Points to perform a melee Attack. A Leadership test is taken with a -5% penalty. If the target fails, it is forced to use Offense Points to attack the user. Trivial to Train.
description.mastery: Leadership test penalty increases to -35%. Easy to Master.

description.basic: Increases Initiative by 10 for 2 turns. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Initiative increases to 20 for 3 turns. Not Stackable.

info.target: Allies within a 5 meter radius around the user

description.basic: Prevents the effects of Mental conditions (Stupidity, Paranoia, Half-Crazy, Megalomania, and Heroic Idiocy) for 1 turn. Can only be used while not engaged. Trivial to Train.
description.mastery: Range increases to 30 meteres and the duration to 3 turns. Easy to Master.

description.basic: Increases Dodge and Parry chance by 20% for 2 turns. Can only be used while not engaged. Not Stackable.

description.basic: Reduces Melee Resistance by 10% for 2 turns. Not Stackable.

description.basic: Target must be engaged with the user. The target takes a Leadership test with a +25% bonus. On failure, it is forced to Flee from the user, providing a free attack to anyone engaged with it. Does not affect targets who would never retreat from battle and do not have the option to flee.

description.basic: Increases melee Damage by 15% for 2 turns.
description.mastery: Melee Damage increases to 20% for 3 turns.

description.basic: Restores 1 Offense Point that can be used to Counter-Attack. Cannot exceed maximum Offense Points. Can only be used while not engaged.

description.basic: Increases Melee Resistance by 10% for 2 turns. Can only be used while not engaged. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Melee Resistance increases to 15% for 3 turns. Not Stackable.

description.basic: Reduces Melee Resistance by 10% for 2 turns. Can only be used while not engaged.

description.basic: Increases Casting chance by 10% for the next spell, but also increases the chance to trigger a Tzeentch Curse by 15%. The next action taken must be a spell or the effect is lost.

description.basic: Increases Casting chance by 10% for the next spell, but also increases the chance to trigger a Divine Wrath by 15%. The next action taken must be a spell or the effect is lost.

description.basic: Reduces the cost of the next Spell cast by 1 Offense Point, but increases the Casting penalty by 15%. The next action taken must be a spell of the effect is lost.

description.basic: Reduces the cost of the next Spell cast by 1 Offense Point, but increases the Casting penalty by 15%. The next action taken must be a spell of the effect is lost.

description.basic: Increases user's Dodge and Parry chance by 20% for 2 turns. Can only be used while not engaged.
description.mastery: Dodge and Parry chance increases to 40% for 3 turns.

The Zombie becomes bound to its master. Ritual ingredients must be paid for in the form of an upkeep. The Zombie will gain experience and will receive four fewer skill points than regular Henchmen
Failing to perform the ritual for extended periods weakens the bond, causing the Zombie to decay and be destroyed.

The Zombie is immune to Open Wound effects and all injuries except Destroyed (Dead), Severed Arm, Severed Leg, Hand Injury, Full Recovery. If it must roll for Injuries at the end of combat, it has a 20% chance to decay and effectively be destroyed. Every Rank of the Zombie reduces this chance by 1%.

description.basic: Enemies engaged with target receive a debuff that reduces melee Hit chance and melee Damage by 10% for 2 turns. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Melee Hit chance and Damage penalty increases to 15%, range to 30m, duration to 3 turns. Casting chance and Wrath chance +5%

description.basic: When performing a melee or ranged attack, inflicts 10-15 damage to self for 2 turns. Priests of Ulric are immune. Target gets one initial chance to resist magic. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Damage increases to 15-20, range to 30m, duration to 3 turns. Casting chance and Wrath chance +5%

description.basic: Deals 8-12 damage and reduces maximum and current Offense Points by 1 for 3 turns. Range is 30 meters. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Damage increases to 16-24, but range is reduced to 20 meters. Casting chance and Wrath chance +5%

description.basic: Deals 12-17 damage and reduces maximum Strategy Points by 1 for 2 turns. Bypasses Armour Absorption. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Damage increases to 24-34 and duration to 3 turns, but range decreases to 20m. Casting chance and Wrath chance +5%

description.basic: Increases Melee Critical hit chance by 5% and Critical damage by 10% for 2 turns. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Melee Critical hit chance increases by 10% and Critical damage by 15% for 3 turns. Casting chance and Wrath chance +5%

info.target: self and allies within 5m of caster.

description.basic: Reduces the cost of Counter-Attack by 1 Offense Point and increases Melee Hit Chance by 5% but, when performing a melee attack, suffer 5-15 damage for 2 turns. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Melee Hit Chance increases by 10%, damage to 10-20, range to 30m, duration to 3 turns. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic:
Increases Wyrdstone Resistance by 20%. Not Stackable.
Gathering a Wyrdstone increases Critical Resistance by 10% for 3 turns. Stackable.
description.mastery: Wyrdstone Resistance increases by 40%, Critical Resistance by 20%, range to 30m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Deals 8-13 damage and reduces Armour Absorption by 5% for 2 turns. Bypasses Armour Absorption. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Damage increases to 16-26, Armour Absorption penalty to 10% for 3 turns. Range is reduced to 20m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Deals 10-14 damage and inflicts a debuff that deals 14-18 damage on the target's next turn. Bypasses Armour Absorption. Stackable.
description.mastery: Damage increases to 20-28, debuff Damage to 28-36, but range is reduced to 20m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic:
Summons an idol at target area. Allies near the totem cannot use Flee or Disengage, are immune to All Alone, and gain 32 wounds when dealing melee damage. The idol must be placed on a walk-able area, and can be destroyed by enemies.
One use only. Only 1 idol may be created per turn
description.mastery: Wounds gained increased to 64, range to 10m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Summons an idol at target area. Everyone near the totem is purged of Magic effects, gains 25% Magic Resistance, and has their Spellcasting cost reduced by 1 Offense Point for Arcane spells and increased by 1 Offense Point for Divine spells. The idol must be placed on a walk-able area, and can be destroyed by enemies. Only 1 idol may be created per turn
description.mastery: Magic Resistance increases by 50%, range to 10m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Summons an idol at target area.  Enemies near the totem have their 9 primary attributes reduced by 3. Cannot reduce below 1. The idol must be placed on a walk-able area, and can be destroyed by enemies. Only 1 idol may be created per turn
description.mastery: Primary attribute penalty increased to 4, range to 10m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Summons an idol at target area. When receiving damage, enemies near the totem gain a stackable Debuff that increases Morale Impact by 1 and decreases Stun and Critical Resistance by 3% for 2 turns. The idol must be placed on a walk-able area, and can be destroyed by enemies. Only 1 idol may be created per turn
description.mastery: Stun and Critical Resistance penalties increase by 6% for 3 turns, range to 10m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Removes all active Warp effects and increases Poison and Wyrdstone Resistance by 20% to a single ally for 2 turns. Not stackable.
description.mastery: Also removes Poison effects. Poison and Wyrdstone Resistance boost increases to 30% for 3 turns, range to 30m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Increases Magic Resistance by 15% for 2 turns. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Magic Resistance boost increases to 20% for 3 turns. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Grants immunity to Fear and provokes Fear on engaged enemies. Increases Armour Absorption by 5% for 2 turns. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Armour Absorbtion boost increases to 10% and the target causes - and is immune to - Terror instead of Fear. Range increases to 30m and duration to 3 turns. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Creates a zone effect at the selected area. Enemies entering or starting a turn inside the area receive a debuff that reduces current and maximum Offense Points by 1 and Melee Hit chance by 5% for 2 turns. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Hit chance reduction increases to 15%. Range increases to 30m. Debuff duration increases to 3 turns. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Reduces Magic Resistance and the chance to pass All Alone, Fear, and Terror tests of a single enemy by 15% for 2 turns. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Magic Resistance and All Alone, Fear, and Terror penalties increase to 20% for 3 turns instead, range to 30m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Deals 10-15 damage to enemies around the caster. Bypasses Armour Absorption.
description.mastery: Damage increases to 20-30. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Increases Armour Absorption by 5% and Dodge and Parry chance by 15% of allies around the caster for 2 turns. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Armour Absorption boost to 10%, Dodge and Parry to 20% and duration to 3 turns. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Restores up to 200 wounds to a single target. One use only.
description.mastery: Wounds restored increases to 400. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Deals 8-13 damage to living targets. Bypasses Armour Absorption. Damage is increased by Disease Carrier debuffs.
description.mastery: Damage increases to 16-26, range decreased to 20m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Increases Movement by 2m and Armour Absorption by 15% for Zombies. Increases Initiative by 10 and Dodge chance by 10% for Vampires, Vampire Thralls, Ghouls and Crypt Horrors. Not Stackable. Does not affect living targets.
description.mastery: Movement increases to 4m, Armour Absorption to 30%, Initiative to 20, Dodge chance to 20%, range to 30m, duration to 3 turns. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Increases Critical and Poison Resistance by 15% and Armour Absorption by 5% for 2 turns. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Critical and Poison Resistance increases to 20% and Armour Absorption increases to 10% for 3 turns instead, range increases to 30m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%.

description.basic: Summons an idol at the target area. Living enemies near the totem have their All Alone, Fear and Terror resistance reduced by 15%, Morale Impact increased by 2 and the cost of Flee and Disengage increased by 1 SP. The idol must be placed on a walkable area, and can be destroyed by enemies. Only one idol may be created per turn.
description.mastery: All Alone, Fear and Terror penalty increases to 30%, Morale Impact to 4, the cost of Flee and Disengage to 2 SP, range to 10m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

info.target: Living enemies within a 5m radius of the idol.

description.basic: Deals 12-16 damage. Bypasses Armour Absorption. If damage is dealt, restores up to 8 wounds to the caster.
description.mastery: Damage increases to 24-32, wounds restored to 16, but range is reduced to 20m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Applies a debuff that deals 40-80 damage on the target's second turn, but has no effect on the first turn. Gathering a Wyrdstone removes the debuff. Bypasses Armour Absorption. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Damage increases to 80-160, but range is reduced to 20m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%. Easy to Master.

description.basic: Reduce maximum OP and SP by 1 for 2 turns. Affects only living targets. Not Stackable.
description.mastery: Duration increases to 3 turns, range to 30m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

description.basic: Deals 7-12 damage. Bypasses Armour Absorption.
description.mastery: Damage increases to 14-24, but range is reduced to 20m. Casting chance and Curse chance +5%

destroyer.name: Destroyer
destroyer.description:
Melee attacks gain the following benefits:
Attacks bypass +{{ melee_armour_bypass }}% Armour Absorption
On hit, applies a poison debuff that reduces Melee Resistance by {{ melee_resistance_reduction }}% for {{ melee_resistance_reduction_duration }} turns. Stackable.

executioner.name: Executioner
executioner.description:
Melee attacks gain the following benefits:
Attacks bypass +{{ melee_armour_bypass }}% Armour Absorption
On hit, applies a poison debuff that reduces Armour Absorption by {{ armour_reduction }}% for {{ armour_reduction_duration }} turns. Stackable.

Melee attacks gain the following benefits:

On hit, applies a poison debuff that reduces Melee Damage dealt by {{ melee_damage_reduction }}% for {{ melee_damage_reduction_duration }} turns. Stackable. Also grants the ability to Parry.

piercer.name: Piercer

Melee attacks gain the following benefits:
Hit chance +{{ melee_hit_chance }}%
On hit, applies a poison debuff that reduces Melee Hit chance by {{ melee_hit_chance_reduction }}% for {{ melee_hit_chance_reduction_duration }} turns. Stackable. Also grants Parry and +5 Initiative.

smasher.name: Smasher
smasher.description:
Melee attacks gain the following benefits:
Critical hit chance +{{ critical_hit_chance }}%
On hit, applies a poison debuff that reduces Initiative by {{ initiative_reduction }} for {{ initiative_reduction_duration }} turns. Stackable. -5 Initiative.

ripper.name: Ripper

Melee attacks gain the following benefits:

On hit, applies a poison debuff that reduces Critical hit Resistance by {{ critical_resist_reduction }}% for {{ critical_resist_reduction_duration }} turns. Stackable. +10 Initiative.

extra_limb_axe.name: Extra Limb - Axe
extra_limb_axe.description:
Melee attacks gain the following benefits:
Melee Damage +10%
Attacks bypass 15% Dodge chance.
Attacks bypass 10% Armour Absorption.

extra_limb_blade.name: Extra Limb - Blade
extra_limb_blade.description:
Melee attacks gain the following benefits:
Melee Damage +10%
Attacks bypass 15% Dodge chance.

extra_limb_mace.name: Extra Limb - Mace
extra_limb_mace.description:
Melee attacks gain the following benefits:
Melee Damage +10%
Attacks bypass 15% Dodge chance
Hit chance +10%

thousand_eyes.name: Thousand Eyes
thousand_eyes.description: Prevents the use of Light and Heavy Armour. Melee and Ranged Resistance +10%

the_eye.name: The Eye
the_eye.description:
Prevents the use of Light and Heavy Armour.
Initiative +20
Critical hit Resistance +20%

featureless_face.name: Featureless Face
featureless_face.description: Perception is free and increased by 100%. Also adds +20 to base Wounds and +40% Poison Resistance.

wyrdstone_horns.name: Wyrdstone Horns
wyrdstone_horns.description:
Prevents the use of Helmets.
Wyrdstone Resistance +50%
On damage received, gain a warp buff that increases Melee and Ranged Resistance by 4% for 3 turns. Stackable.

crown_of_bones.name: Crown of Bones
crown_of_bones.description:
Prevents the use of Helmets.
Morale +5
Stun Resistance +50%
Armour Absorption +10%

claw_foot.name: Claw Foot
claw_foot.description:
Movement range +1 meters
Ambush and Charge range +3 meters
Chance to pass Climb, Leap, Jump Down tests +10%

severed_arm.name: Severed Arm
severed_arm.description: The warrior's left arm was dismembered in battle or so badly damaged that it had to be amputated. The warrior can no longer climb or use a two handed weapon. However, the warrior gains a 20% Dodge bonus due to his newfound balance.

severed_leg.name: Severed Leg
severed_leg.description: The warrior's left leg was dismembered in battle or so badly damaged that it had to be amputated. Movement is now reduced by 1 meter, and Climbing is no longer possible. Leap and Jump Down chance is reduced by 25%.

missing_eye.name: Missing Eye
missing_eye.description: The warriors right eye has been ruined. The warrior is effectively blind in this eye. A 10% penalty now applies to Melee and Ranged hit chance, but a bonus of 10% also applies to Perception and 10 to Initiative.

burst_eardrum.name: Burst Eardrum
burst_eardrum.description: One of the warrior's eardrums has burst, leaving it half deaf. Perception checks made by this warrior suffer a 25% penalty.

skull_fracture.name: Skull Fracture
skull_fracture.description: A skull wound has left the warrior stupid, sometimes forgetting what it must do. If not engaged in melee, the warrior must pass an intelligence test or do nothing for the turn.

broken_jaw.name: Broken Jaw
broken_jaw.description: The warrior's jaw has been shattered, resulting in impaired speech. The injury reduces Leadership and maximum Leadership by 1 and Spellcasting chances by 5%.

brain_trauma.name: Brain Trauma
brain_trauma.description: Trauma to the head has impared the warrior's mental faculties. Intelligence and maximum Intelligence are both reduced by 1 as a result of brain damage.

tendonitis.name: Tendonitis
tendonitis.description: The warrior suffers from tendonitis in the wrists. This injury reduces Strength and maximum Strength by 1.

impacted_vision.name: Impacted Vision
impacted_vision.description: Damage to the eyes has impared the warrior's vision. The warrior's Weapon and Ballistic Skill as well as their maximums, are reduced by 1 because of poor eyesight.

confusion.name: Confusion
confusion.description: Mental damage causes the warrior to suffer random moments of confusion. This injury reduces Alertness and maximum Alertness by 1.

twitch.name: Twitch
twitch.description: Damage to the warrior's nervous system has left it with a pronounced and bebilitating twitch. This injury reduces Agility and its maximum by 1.

chest_wound.name: Chest Wound
chest_wound.description: The warrior has suffered a grisly injury to the chest. Even after recovery, this wound leaves the warrior weakened, reducing its Toughness and maximum Toughness by 1.

old_battle_wound.name: Old Battle Wound
old_battle_wound.description: Crippling damage to the warrior's nervous system has left it with recurrent pains. This injury reduces Accuracy and its maximum by 1.

maimed_hand.name: Maimed Hand
maimed_hand.description: The warrior has suffered a mutilating injury to its hand. The loss of dexterity causes the chance to hit with Melee and Ranged attacks to be reduced by 10%.

internal_wound.name: Internal Wound
internal_wound.description: The warrior has suffered internal damage that will never heal properly and which exerts a persistent degree of pain. The warrior looses 1 Offence Point.

concussion.name: Concussion
concussion.description: A brutal blow to the head has caused the warrior to suffer a cuncussion, causing it to sometimes be confused in battle. The warrior loses 1 Strategy Point.

mysterious_ailment.name: Mysterious Ailment
mysterious_ailment.description: An unknown disease has beset the warrior, provoking a permanent fever. The warriror's base Wound value is reduced by 10 as a result of this affliction.

amok.name: Amok
amok.description: Suffering violent mental derangement, the warrior will never again disengage or flee from an enemy - the warrior will always fight to the very end!

megalomania.name: Megalomania
megalomania.description: The warrior has developed a maniacal belief in its own might and power. From now on it cannot use ranged weapons and the cost of spells increases by 2 Offence Points.

tome_of_abilities.name: Tome of Abilities
tome_of_abilities.description:
Grants 2 Skill Points.
Only usable out of combat.
This item can only be used ONCE per warrior.

tome_of_magic.name: Tome of Magic
tome_of_magic.description:
Grants 2 Spell Points.
Only usable out of combat.
This item can only be used ONCE per warrior.

physical_grimoire.name: Physical Grimoire
physical_grimoire.description:
Grants 3 Physical Attribute points.
Only usable out of combat.
Only ONE Grimoire can be used per warrior (Martial, Physical or Mental).

mental_grimoire.name: Mental Grimoire
mental_grimoire.description:
Grants 3 Mental Attribute points.
Only usable out of combat.
Only ONE Grimoire can be used per warrior (Martial, Physical or Mental).

martial_grimoire.name: Martial Grimoire
martial_grimoire.description:
Grants 3 Martial Attribute points.
Only usable out of combat.
Only ONE Grimoire can be used per warrior (Martial, Physical or Mental).

book_of_accuracy.name: Book of Training: Accuracy
book_of_accuracy.description:
Permanently increases maximum Accuracy by 3 points, up to a maxmimum of 20 (25 for Impressive).
Only usable out of combat.
Only ONE Book can be used per warrior (Accuracy, Agility, Alertness, Ballistic Skill, Intelligence, Leadership, Strength, Toughness or Weapon Skill).
